title.rendered: Dental & Eye Camp for Sahibzada Ajit Singh Ji School students

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation organised a free Dental & Eye Check-up camp at Sahibzada Ajit Singh Ji School at Sarhali near Phagwara in Punjab. Dr. S. Ranjan (MS) and Dr. Kiran (BDS) conducted the camp supported by a professional medical team.

More than 1100 children benefitted from the camp. “Good health and good habits are very important factors for children to get benefits from quality education and grow up as empowered individuals,” says Mr. Kulvir Kumar, Smile Foundation’s Child for Child (CFC) programme manager in Punjab.

The children were oriented by the doctors on ‘How to protect teeth and eyes’ after the check-up programme.

President Harminder Singh and Director Raghvir Singh Chahal thanked Smile Foundation and the team of doctors for the programme.

Principal Jatinder Kaur said, “This is a beautiful beginning for promoting health among the children in Phagwara area and we look forward to more such camps in and around the region together.”
